response.overview: The film takes as its starting point the images of the fall of a meteorite, the asteroid that flew over the Russian region of Chelyabinsk in 2013. In a journey from the stratosphere, we attend to the meteorite's testimonies that will allow us to discover the frustrated search towards its corporeal reality. Passing through layers of infrastructure and ergonomics, the material implications of the proliferation of the digital image emerge.
response.title: Polvo de Otro Planeta
